mapper.select: SELECT i.inquiry_id inquiryId, i.user_id userId, u.nickname nickname, i.register_date registerDate, i.type type, i.title title, i.content content, i.progress progress, i.answer answer, i.answer_date answerDate, i.is_like isLike FROM inquiries i LEFT JOIN users u ON i.user_id = u.user_id
SELECT FAQ_id FAQId, question question, answer answer FROM FAQs

SELECT challenge_id challengeId, CONCAT('http://', #{domain}, ':8080/image/challenge/', image) image, title title, content content, content_summary contentSummary, authentication_method authenticationMethod, CONCAT('http://localhost:8080/image/sticker/', sticker_image) stickerImage, sticker_shape stickerShape FROM challenges
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenges(image, title, content, content_summary, authentication_method, sticker_image, sticker_shape) VALUES (#{image}, #{title}, #{content}, #{contentSummary}, #{authenticationMethod}, #{stickerImage}, #{stickerShape})
